Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
19.11.2014 SH SCR19323 Changed update SFEX_CITADELMFST (now with sequence numbers 1,2,3, ...)
08.10.2014 GB SCR19216 Changed value of update SFEX_SUPPLIERID
01.10.2014 SH SCR19183 Changed update V.DISCOUNT (SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT is now used instead
22.09.2014 SH SCR19140 Changed updates SFEX_FULLAMOUNT and SFEX_CERTIFIEDAMOUNT if SFEX_CLNTNO <> 60130 and
added rounding of v.SIRD_RATE to 2 decimals if SFEX_CLNTNO <> 60130
14.07.2014 SH SCR19014 Changes regarding Carrefour ES (update SFEX_THEORETICALCOMMISSION and
SFEX_TRADINGTIMESTAMP and BPH128.PI.DATEIN = SFDI_ADVANCEDATE if SFDH_CLNTNO = 60130 else SFDH_VALUEDATE)
06.03.2014 SH SCR18761 Set v.DISCOUNT = 0 if < 0
19.02.2014 SH SCR18704 Changed BH128.PI.COUNTRY = 'ZZ' into 'DS'
10.02.2014 SH SCR18693 Extended SFEX updates (e.g. discount/interest rate fields)
23.01.2014 SH SCR18667 Added CLIT614_DEBITINTERESTPERC for calc of v.DISCOUNT

ExpSyntax.val: 'There exists no row in table SFDH'

Text.val: ... it's a restart, end program
-- Set trigger (if no row is selected job turns to MSGW)
... finally submit BSF404 or BSF405, see Task suffix, after database updates
-- Set SFEX_NO
-- Set SFEX_DISCOUNTAMOUNT
... calc advance days
-- Set SFEX_INVO_NO
-- Set SFEX_REQUESTEDFINANCEC
... advance is already created
... check if invoice already exist via incremental files
-- Update SFEX_CURRENTFINANCEH
... set to 0, to avoid double advances via incremental files
